title: Subject metadata template template schema
description: Subject metadata template template schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54

propertyDescriptions.Subject-General: Metadata relating to the subject of the experiment.
propertyDescriptions.Subject-Surgery: Information on surgeries performed on of the animal.
propertyDescriptions.Subject-Training: Information on training of the animal.

items.title: Subject-General field schema
items.description: Subject-General field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54

propertyDescriptions.species: Binomial species name from NCBI taxonomy
propertyDescriptions.strain: String value indicating the strain of the species, for example: C57BL/6J.
propertyDescriptions.strainRRID: Research resource identifier (RRID) of the strain of the species.
propertyDescriptions.abbreviatedID: Abbreviated identifier of the subject, for instance, identifier used in file names.
propertyDescriptions.genotypic sex: Sex of the subject being defined.
propertyDescriptions.age: Age of the participant at time of begining of recording (first data point recorded) in years.
propertyDescriptions.character: Remarks on the general characteristics of the subject.
